explains: n. （美）雅皮士（属于中上阶层的年轻专业人士）

sentences.en: This guy is a superficial yuppie with no intellect whatsoever.
sentences.cn: 这个家伙是个肤浅的雅皮士，没有任何智慧。

sentences.en: The Porsche 911 reminds me of the worst parts of the yuppie era.
sentences.cn: 这辆保时捷911使我想起了雅皮士时代最糟糕的日子。

sentences.en: National chains that once ignored Harlem now anticipate yuppie money and want pieces of this prime Manhattan real estate.
sentences.cn: 曾经对哈莱姆区视而不见的全国性连锁企业，现在期待着雅皮士的钱，还想要占据曼哈顿的黄金地产。
